# Customer Journey Map

## Stage 1: Awareness
- [ ] How do customers first become aware of your product/service?

## Stage 2: Consideration
- [ ] What factors do customers consider when evaluating your offering?

## Stage 3: Decision
- [ ] What leads customers to choose your product/service?

## Stage 4: Adoption
- [ ] How do customers start using your product/service?

## Stage 5: Retention
- [ ] What keeps customers coming back?

## Touchpoints
- [ ] List all the touchpoints customers have with your brand.

## Emotions
- [ ] Map the emotions customers experience at each stage.
